mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xxl_job_log_report ( trigger_day, running_count, suc_count, fail_count ) VALUES ( #{triggerDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{runningCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sucCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{failCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM xxl_job_log_report t WHERE t.trigger_day between #{triggerDayFrom} and #{triggerDayTo} ORDER BY t.trigger_day ASC
